resources.string:
Name: Shakib Al Hasan Position: All-rounder Batting order: 3 Salary: $1 million Tournament team: Kolkata Knight Riders Category: A
NB: The salaries are based on the Bangladesh Cricket Board\'s (BCB) central contract system. The players are divided into three categories: A, B, and C. The A category players are the highest paid, followed by the B category players, and then the C category players.
The tournament teams are the teams that the players play for in the Bangladesh Premier League (BPL). The BPL is a professional Twenty20 cricket league that was founded in 2012. The league currently consists of seven teams: Chattogram Challengers, Comilla Victorians, Dhaka Dynamites, Fortune Barishal, Khulna Tigers, Rajshahi Kings, and Sylhet Sixers.
